channel.title: [317] DezNation - Recruiting Programmers
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/logo-1.png[/img]
[b][size=14pt]About:[/size][/b]
DezNation is a 317 server almost ready, but we need some beta testers to help us find the bugs. We are in need of a Programmer that can join our team. What do I expect from the programmer? I expect he or she be online enough to get jobs finished. Work with others well. It would help if you had a mic to talk with.
[size=14pt][b] Application:[/b][/size]
[code] Name: Age: Java Experience: RSPS Experience: Skype:[/code]
[b][size=14pt]Contact:[/size][/b]
Skype: brock-shelton
[b][size=14pt]Info:[/size][/b]
Base: PI Server Type: Eco/ PK Windows VPS - $25 a month Our website and forums are both up
[b][size=14pt]Team:[/size][/b]
Owner: Logic (me)
Forum Admin: Brad
Programmer: Spider Programmer: Cameron
[b][size=14pt]Features:[/size][/b]
-Auto Donate -Pk Points System -Jarred Webclient -Vote4Cash -Home Area -Donator Area -Shops -Godwars -15+ bosses -Players drop items upon death -Nice Quest List -Skilling area -Great Home -All skills trainable -Economy -Combat training teleports -Skillcape emotes -Spirit Shields -Clan Chat Working -PvP Armours, Chaotics (All) -Torva, Vitrus, Pernix, Ect -Nomad -and many more!
[b]Combat:[/b]
PvP fully complete PvN fully complete Perfect max hit formulas Perfect accuracy formula Every weapon special attack Equipment effects (i.e. barrows) Equipment requirements Degradable equipment Weapon poisoning Every modern combat spell Every ancient combat spell Can't mage through walls Staves that give unlimited amount of runes working Bows/arrows Throwing weapons (knives, darts, javelins, throwing axes) Crossbows (the regular one and karil's) Can't shoot through walls Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal) All bones bury-able Every prayer working properly Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate Skills:
[IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/QusJe.gif[/img]
Emptying and refilling rocks All ores can be mined Correct pickaxe finding and animations Prospecting Random chance of obtaining gems Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms
[IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/Bbq6R.gif[/img]
All bars can be made All bars can be forged into items All equipment can be produced Correct animations, interfaces and objects used
[IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/HFOC2.gif[/img]
All fish can be caught Correct item requirements Fishing spots located all around the world Correct animations Moving fishing locations
[IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/Xvfj1.gif[/img]
All fish can be cooked All meats can be cooked Correct burning formula Cooking gauntlets Lumbridge cooking range bonus Eating food (in pieces) Correct animation and timing used
[IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/UpykY.gif[/img]
Stumps and regrowing trees Correct hatchet finding Correct hatchet animations All trees cut-able Correct fell chance algorithms Birds nest falling out
All logs light able Adding and depleting of lightened logs Colored fires "Backward" firelighting Ashes appear after logs burn out Correct animations Clipped
[IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/YnmBh.gif[/img]
Gnome, Wilderness, Pyramid and Brimhaven courses usable All obstacles Force movement mask Correct animations used
[IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/7wikM.gif[/img]
Correct animations Herb Identifying All potions can be made Correct first and secondary ingredients Can pour doses into other potions (must be the same potion)
[IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/KbkQ8.gif[/img]
NPC thievery working with correct stunning formula Can thieve from stalls and can get caught by surrounding guards Correct animations and graphics used
[IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/5zdcP.gif[/img]
Cutting gems Making amulets, necklaces, and rings Stringing amulets and necklaces Tanning normal, hard, and dragon hide Crafting normal, hard, and dragon hide Spinning wool and flax Attaching studs
[b]RuneCrafting[/b]
Use of the Abyss All altars working Correct multiple crafting Use of Pouches included Tiaras enchanting
[b]Fletching[/b]
All logs can be fletched Option interface for short or long bow (shafts if normal log) Can string bows Can make arrows
[IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/OomYz.gif[/img] Very easy, easy, medium, hard and very hard slayer tasks Slayer gem working All equipment working Correct requirements for slayer monsters
[IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/NYu86.gif[/img] All major seeds work Actual growth, but sped up
[b][size=14pt]Minigames:[/size][/b]
Castlewars Barrows Fight Pits Duel Arena Pest Control CastleWars Barbarian Assault

item.title: [317] DezNation - Recruiting Programmers
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

BuhRock:

Still looking for a developer or two. Need someone who can load a higher cache and add items to the game. Everyone who has added me so far has avoided doing work. Please don’t waste my time.

Why? if you want higher revision animations and things, use a higher revision. Also, there are plenty of tutorials on adding items ingame, just google them :).

Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] DezNation - Recruiting Programmers
item.dc:creator: @zlLux zlLux
item.description:
@zlLux wrote:

I would recommend you switch your vps to Linux. It runs faster. I can host for you my vps has 12 processers and has 5500mb ram approx. O and btw I am learning java at the moment. If you are interested pm me ill add you on Skype soon.

Read full topic
